sections.title: Death Slayer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Death Slayer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Channel Energy (Su) (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Grants the ability to channel positive energy to harm undead creatures, functioning like a cleric's channel energy but only for damage. Uses Charisma modifier and class level for determining uses per day and save DC.

sections.title: Channel Smite (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Automatically grants the Channel Smite feat as a bonus feat at 1st level. If already possessed, allows selection of a different bonus feat from the 2nd level list.

sections.title: Gravegaze (Su) (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Provides constant deathwatch benefits, allowing the death slayer to see the health status of creatures at all times.

sections.title: Bonus Feats (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Grants additional bonus feats at 2nd level and every 3 levels thereafter, selected from a specific list of channel energy and undead-focused feats.

sections.title: Favored Enemy (Ex) (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Grants undead as a favored enemy with standard ranger bonuses, stacking with other favored enemy abilities. The bonus increases to +4 at 6th level.

sections.title: Swift Smite (Su) (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Allows additional uses of Channel Smite per day equal to death slayer level without expending channel energy uses, and enables activating Channel Smite as an immediate action after rolling attack.

sections.title: Infuse Sabre (Su) (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Infuses a sawtooth sabre with positive energy as a swift action, increasing channeled energy damage by 50% and imposing -2 penalty on undead saves for 3 rounds.

sections.title: Deadly Conviction (Su) (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Provides +4 morale bonus on saves against undead effects and allows ignoring one negative level once per day.

sections.title: Undead Bane (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Makes one wielded sawtooth sabre function as a bane weapon against undead creatures while wielded by the death slayer.

sections.title: Aura of Life (Su) (Death Slayer)
sections.description: Creates a 10-foot aura that deals 4d6 positive energy damage to undead at the start of their turn and grants the death slayer fast healing 10.
